panels.description: Amazon Redshift version
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Compute node type

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN capacity = 190633  AND NOT is_nvme    THEN 'dc1.large'
        WHEN capacity = 380319                     THEN 'dc1.8xlarge'
        WHEN capacity = 190633  AND is_nvme        THEN 'dc2.large'
        WHEN capacity = 760956                     THEN 'dc2.8xlarge'
        WHEN capacity = 726296                     THEN 'dc2.8xlarge'
        WHEN capacity = 952455                     THEN 'ds2.xlarge' 
        WHEN capacity = 945026                     THEN 'ds2.8xlarge' 
        WHEN capacity = 954367  AND part_count = 1 THEN 'ra3.xlplus'
        WHEN capacity = 3339176 AND part_count = 1 THEN 'ra3.4xlarge' 
        WHEN capacity = 3339176 AND part_count = 4 THEN 'ra3.16xlarge' 
        ELSE 'unknown' 
    END AS v
FROM (
    SELECT
        capacity,
        mount LIKE '/dev/nvme%' AS is_nvme,
        count(1) AS part_count
    FROM stv_partitions
    WHERE host = 0 AND owner = 0 
    GROUP BY 1, 2
    ORDER BY 1 DESC
    LIMIT 1
) AS s

panels.title: Node Type

panels.description: Shows if AQUA is enabled
panels.title: AQUA

panels.description: Workload management mode
panels.title: WLM Mode

panels.description: Number of compute nodes

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    node::text AS node, 
    (1.0 * used/capacity)::numeric(6, 2) AS utilization,
    capacity,
    used
FROM stv_node_storage_capacity 
ORDER BY utilization DESC, node::integer

panels.title: Number of Nodes

panels.description: Total compute node storage capacity, including the capacity reserved for internal data. Total used compute node storage, including internal data.

panels.description: Storage capacity utilization % for each compute nodes
panels.title: Nodes by Storage Utilization

panels.description: Workload management queues with their characteristics

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    service_class::text AS "#",
    name,
    num_query_tasks AS slots,
    query_working_mem AS workmem,
    max_execution_time AS timeout,
    trim(concurrency_scaling) AS concurrency_scaling,
    trim(query_priority) AS priority
FROM stv_wlm_service_class_config
WHERE service_class > 4
ORDER BY service_class DESC

panels.title: WLM Queue Configuration

panels.description: Total slice count on all the nodes
panels.title: Number of Slices

panels.description: Number of currently authorized user connections to the cluster

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT count(1) FROM pg_stat_activity 
WHERE 
    datname NOT IN ('padb_harvest', 'template0', 'template1') AND 
    usename != 'rdsdb' AND
    procpid != pg_backend_pid()

panels.title: Open Connections

panels.description: Change in the number of database connections, not the actual connection number

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(recordtime, $__interval),
    sum(opened) AS opened,
    sum(closed) AS closed
FROM (
    SELECT
        recordtime,
        CASE WHEN event = 'initiating session' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS opened,
        CASE WHEN event = 'disconnecting session' THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS closed
    FROM stl_connection_log
    WHERE
        event IN ('initiating session', 'disconnecting session') AND
        dbname NOT IN ('padb_harvest', 'template0', 'template1') AND username != 'rdsdb' AND
        $__timeFilter(recordtime)
) AS d
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Opened and Closed Connections

panels.description: Top tables by number of scans

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    "time",
    CASE WHEN rnk <= 5 THEN rnk::text || ': ' || table_name ELSE 'other tables' END AS "table",
    sum(cnt) AS " "
FROM (
    SELECT
        "time",
        table_name,
        cnt,
        total,
        dense_rank() OVER (ORDER BY total DESC, table_name) AS rnk
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            "time",
            table_name,
            cnt,
            sum(cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY table_name) AS total
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeGroup(s.endtime, $__interval),
                n.nspname || '.' || c.relname AS table_name,
                count(DISTINCT query) AS cnt
            FROM stl_scan AS s
            JOIN pg_class AS c ON c.oid = s.tbl
            JOIN pg_namespace AS n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
            WHERE
                s.type = 2 AND
                trim(perm_table_name) != 'Internal Worktable' AND
                perm_table_name NOT LIKE 'volt_tt_%' AND
                $__timeFilter(s.endtime)
            GROUP BY 1, 2
            ORDER BY 1, 2
        ) AS table_cnt
    ) AS table_cnt_total
) AS table_cnt_total_rnk
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER by 1, 2

panels.title: Top Tables by Scans

panels.description: Various info and statistics on the database tables. Can be sorted and filtered by any column. By default it is sorted by size in the descendant order.

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT 
    schema, 
    "table", 
    size, 
    tbl_rows AS rows, 
    unsorted AS unsorted_pct, 
    stats_off, 
    vacuum_sort_benefit AS vacuum_sort_benefit_pct
FROM svv_table_info
ORDER BY size DESC

panels.title: Table Information

panels.description: Query count grouped by processing time. The processing time doesn't include lock wait, and other pre- queuing steps.

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(end_time, $__interval),
    sum(CASE WHEN total_time >= 1000000*60*60::bigint THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "1h+",
    sum(CASE WHEN total_time >= 1000000*10*60 AND total_time < 1000000*60*60::bigint THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "10m-1h",
    sum(CASE WHEN total_time >= 1000000*60 AND total_time < 1000000*10*60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "1m-10m",
    sum(CASE WHEN total_time >= 1000000*10 AND total_time < 1000000*60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "10s-1m",
    sum(CASE WHEN total_time < 1000000*10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "<10s",
    1.0 * (
        sum(CASE WHEN wlm_query IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) /
        nullif(sum(CASE WHEN query IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)
    ) AS result_cache_hit_pct,
    sum(aborted) AS incomplete_queries
FROM (
    SELECT 
        coalesce(service_class_end_time, endtime) AS end_time,
        datediff(
            microsecond, 
            coalesce(service_class_start_time, starttime), 
            coalesce(service_class_end_time, endtime)
        ) AS total_time,
        swq.query AS wlm_query,
        sq.query AS query,
        aborted
    FROM (
        SELECT * FROM stl_query
        WHERE userid != 1 AND $__timeFilter(endtime)
    ) AS sq
    FULL JOIN (
        SELECT * FROM stl_wlm_query
        WHERE service_class > 4 AND userid != 1 AND $__timeFilter(exec_end_time)
    ) AS swq ON 
        swq.query = sq.query
) AS s
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Query Count by Processing Time

panels.description: Total size of the data blocks read by statements

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(starttime, $__interval),
    sum(blocks_read) AS data_size_read,
    sum(rows) AS scaned_rows,
    count(DISTINCT query) AS writing_intermediate_to_disk
FROM (
    SELECT
        starttime,

        CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND blocks_read > 0 THEN blocks_read
        ELSE NULL END AS blocks_read,

        CASE WHEN segment > -1 AND step_type = 1 AND step > -1 AND rows > 0 THEN rows
        ELSE NULL END AS rows,

        CASE WHEN segment = -1 AND step_type = -1 AND step = -1 AND blocks_to_disk > 0 THEN query
        ELSE NULL END AS query
    FROM stl_query_metrics
    WHERE
        service_class > 4 AND
        $__timeFilter(starttime)
) AS s
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Size of Data Read by Statements

panels.title: Result Cache Hit Percentage

panels.title: Rows Scanned by Statements

panels.title: Incomplete Queries

panels.description: Number of statements using disk to write intermediate results to disk
panels.title: Statements Writing Intermediate Results to Disk

panels.description: Time spent waiting in the commit queue

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(endtime, $__interval),
    avg(datediff(
        microsecond, 
        CASE WHEN startqueue < '2010-01-01' THEN startwork ELSE startqueue END, 
        startwork
    )) AS avg_commit_wait_time,
    max(datediff(
        microsecond, 
        CASE WHEN startqueue < '2010-01-01' THEN startwork ELSE startqueue END, 
        startwork
    )) AS max_commit_wait_time,
    avg(datediff(microsecond, startwork, endtime)) AS avg_commit_time,
    max(datediff(microsecond, startwork, endtime)) AS max_commit_time,
    avg(newblocks) AS avg_new_permanant_blocks,
    max(newblocks) AS max_new_permanant_blocks,
    avg(dirtyblocks) AS avg_to_be_written_blocks,
    max(dirtyblocks) AS max_to_be_written_blocks,
    avg(queuelen) AS avg_commit_queue_length,
    max(queuelen) AS max_commit_queue_length
FROM stl_commit_stats
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(endtime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Commit Wait Time

panels.title: Commit Time

panels.description: Queue wait time percentiles - $service_class

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(queue_end_time, $__interval),
    percentile_cont(1)    WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_queue_time) AS p100,
    percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_queue_time) AS p75,
    percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_queue_time) AS p50
FROM stl_wlm_query
WHERE
    service_class = split_part(${service_class:singlequote}, ':', 1) AND
    $__timeFilter(queue_end_time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Queue Wait Time - $service_class

panels.description: Execution time percentiles - $service_class

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(exec_end_time, $__interval),
    percentile_cont(1)    WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_exec_time) AS p100,
    percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_exec_time) AS p75,
    percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_exec_time) AS p50
FROM stl_wlm_query
WHERE
    service_class = split_part(${service_class:singlequote}, ':', 1) AND
    $__timeFilter(exec_end_time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Execution Time - $service_class

panels.description: Number of queries in the queue by priority. This number doesn't include queries which started before and ended after the time window.

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT 
    "time",
    CASE query_priority 
        WHEN 'Highest' THEN 5
        WHEN 'High'    THEN 4
        WHEN 'Normal'  THEN 3
        WHEN 'Low'     THEN 2
        WHEN 'Lowest'  THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END || ': ' || query_priority,
    cnt + CASE WHEN min_cnt > 0 THEN 0 ELSE -min_cnt END AS " "
FROM (
    SELECT 
        "time",
        query_priority,
        cnt,
        min(cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY query_priority) AS min_cnt
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            "time",
            query_priority,
            sum(cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY query_priority ORDER BY "time" ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS cnt
        FROM (
            SELECT
                "time",
                coalesce(started_queuing.query_priority, ended_queuing.query_priority) AS query_priority,
                coalesce(started_queuing.cnt, 0) - coalesce(ended_queuing.cnt, 0) AS cnt
            FROM (
                SELECT
                    $__timeGroup(queue_start_time, $__interval),
                    query_priority,
                    count(1) AS cnt
                FROM stl_wlm_query
                WHERE $__timeFilter(queue_start_time)
                GROUP BY 1, 2
            ) AS started_queuing
            FULL JOIN (
                SELECT
                    $__timeGroup(queue_end_time, $__interval),
                    query_priority,
                    count(1) AS cnt
                FROM stl_wlm_query
                WHERE $__timeFilter(queue_end_time)
                GROUP BY 1, 2
            ) AS ended_queuing USING ("time", query_priority)
        ) AS cont_queued
    ) AS min_cont_queued
) AS adj_cont_queued
ORDER BY 1, 2

panels.title: Queued Queries by Priority

panels.description: Number of queries being executed by priority. This number doesn't include queries which started before and ended after the time window.

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT 
    "time",
    CASE query_priority 
        WHEN 'Highest' THEN 5
        WHEN 'High'    THEN 4
        WHEN 'Normal'  THEN 3
        WHEN 'Low'     THEN 2
        WHEN 'Lowest'  THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END || ': ' || query_priority,
    cnt + CASE WHEN min_cnt > 0 THEN 0 ELSE -min_cnt END AS " "
FROM (
    SELECT 
        "time",
        query_priority,
        cnt,
        min(cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY query_priority) AS min_cnt
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            "time",
            query_priority,
            sum(cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY query_priority ORDER BY "time" ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS cnt
        FROM (
            SELECT
                "time",
                coalesce(started_executing.query_priority, ended_executing.query_priority) AS query_priority,
                coalesce(started_executing.cnt, 0) - coalesce(ended_executing.cnt, 0) AS cnt
            FROM (
                SELECT
                    $__timeGroup(exec_start_time, $__interval),
                    query_priority,
                    count(1) AS cnt
                FROM stl_wlm_query
                WHERE $__timeFilter(exec_start_time)
                GROUP BY 1, 2
            ) AS started_executing
            FULL JOIN (
                SELECT
                    $__timeGroup(exec_end_time, $__interval),
                    query_priority,
                    count(1) AS cnt
                FROM stl_wlm_query
                WHERE $__timeFilter(exec_end_time)
                GROUP BY 1, 2
            ) AS ended_executing USING ("time", query_priority)
        ) AS cont_executed
    ) AS min_cont_executed
) AS adj_cont_executed
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Executing Queries by Priority

panels.description: Percentage of queries executed in Concurrency Scaling clusters per service class

targets.rawSQL:
-- grafana-redshift-default-dashboard
SELECT
    $__timeGroup(exec_end_time, $__interval),
    service_class || ': ' || name,
    1.0*sum(CASE WHEN concurrency_scaling_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/count(1) AS " "
FROM stl_wlm_query
JOIN stl_query USING (query)
JOIN stv_wlm_service_class_config USING (service_class)
WHERE
    service_class > 4 AND
    $__timeFilter(exec_end_time)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

panels.title: Percentage of Queries in Concurrency Scaling

query.rawSQL:
SELECT service_class || ': ' || name
FROM stv_wlm_service_class_config
WHERE service_class > 4
ORDER BY service_class DESC
